tool_description: Find similar movies and series based on a given movie ID.

api_list.name: find similar
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of movies that are similar to the specified movie.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier of the movie for which similar movies are to be found.

api_list.name: get Id
api_list.description: Obtain the unique ID of a movie based on its title.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The title of the movie to search for.
